name: The Florida Hotel and Conference Center

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My SO and I visited Orlando one cold weekend. Considering the cold, windy weather, the parking was not very convenient; however, we were able to have free valet with our Priceline deal. The room, especially the bathroom, was clean. The bed was very comfortable. My only complaints are that the hallways seemed to not be heated and there was colder air blowing out the vents (this was a 30○ weekend) and that there was no way to get extra bottles of water, sodas, or other snacks after 11pm. (No vending machines!) We ended up having to leave and find convenience store to tide us over until morning. Love the fact the hotel was connected to the mall and there was a Starbucks conveniently located in the hotel's lobby.
reviews.title: Nice

reviews.text: Excellent room, very good size, well maintained, very good quality furnishings and clean. Reception Staff were very helpful as were the restaurant staff, where breakfast is also served. Hotel also has an outdoor swimming pool, which I didn't use. Hotel is connected to the Florida Mall, so shopping is easy. Hotel is also close to major routes and therefore easy to use as a base for travelling further. Stayed during Daytona weekend as part of a package. Would definitely use again for other visits to the area. Unlike other traveller I found there were enough sockets in the room to charge my notebook, Blackberry and camera batteries.
reviews.title: Florida Hotel and Convention Center

reviews.text: Went to Orlando for a work conference and although I did not pick the hotel, it turned out to be surprisingly nice. The lobby and public areas were extremely clean, the conference rooms were very nice and great service EVERY where in the hotel. We were given the option of foregoing room cleaning and get a $5.00 coupon to use a any of the restaurants or food shops in the hotel. For a 2 night stay, not getting the bed made was no big deal. The room had over 4 clean towels and staying in the room by myself was not a big deal. I make my bed anyway. The beds were great, what I had a major problem with were the pillows. They were firm and BIG. After the conference finished we went for happy hour at Crickets inside the hotel. The house wine was good and at 2 for 1 for $8.00 was not a bad deal. We had the taco chips and they were colorful and good. We were offered complimentary breakfast but it was rolls and danishes. We didn't care for it so the next morning we went to Marcelo's for breakfast. It was convenient and although it was $15, it was worth it. The lunches were complimentary to those of us participating the conference and the food offered was good and again the service and customer assistance was OUTSTANDING! Another good thing with the hotel is that it was connected to the Florida Mall, so there was a lot to do at night after the conference without the need of a car. The only downside is the temptation to shop although it's important to note: this is NOT an outlet mall. For the Premium Outlet Mall you need a car, but there was not time, so the mall was just a fine alternative. There is also a Starbucks inside the hotel and it was nice for the breaks. I don't know what type of deal the State got but I truly enjoyed the time there to the point that it felt like a mini-vacation although I was without my spouse. But it was good, I had fun with co-workers and was missed at home. In conclusion I liked the hotel and a nice getaway!
reviews.title: Went for work, but enjoyed it like a vacation

reviews.text: I have stayed at this hotel many times and have always been made to feel very welcome
reviews.title: Great hotel in a convenient location!

reviews.text: by the staff. They really know what customer service means and are enthusiastic in
reviews.title: Bad experience

reviews.text: We stay at the Florida Hotel for our Corporate meetings, and love that fact that this hotel is very family friendly! The rooms are clean, beds are comfortable. For those who love to shop, this hotel is conveniently attached to the Florida Mall. It was great to be able to dine and shop all in one place without having to drive! Water is replenished daily in the room and customer service at this hotel was excellent! We also had breakfast and lunch at the hotel and food was great!
reviews.title: Excellent Location

reviews.text: This is a safe place to stay, the staff is very accommodating, clean rooms
reviews.title: Easy Access,Clean Rooms, Friendly Staff

reviews.text: Great Spa!!
reviews.title: Nice Place, Excellent Value

reviews.text: The hotel is convenient to all the major roadways, it is attached to the Florida Mall so there are plenty of things to do during your stay.
reviews.title: Nice and Convenient

reviews.text: The GYM is great, the beds are comfortable all the way down to the pillows!!!
reviews.title: Weekend get a way

reviews.text: Stayed here for 2 days of shopping before my family joined me for our holiday. It's attached to this HUGE mall that has every store imaginable. I walked to Red Lobster, Target, and Marshall's, and felt very safe and secure as a single traveller. Room was clean, but a bit dated. The staff were pleasant and friendly and helpful. The pool area was clean and well maintained. I would stay here again.
reviews.title: Very easy and convenient

reviews.text: This hotel offers a great green program... Complete a participation card (found on the bed and hang on your door) when you leave your room, turn on the "do not disturb" light skipping the housekeeping (clean towels and sheets) ... you earn $5.00 reward toward purchases made in the in-house Starbucks, On the Go shop, or the hotel Grill restaurant.
reviews.title: Great Experience

reviews.text: Hotel adjoins mall... great for shopping. Staff very friendly. Food wonderful. Can't ask for more. I would stay there again!
reviews.title: Very Good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are from Germany and this hotel was our last hotel from a three week round trip with Motorbikes. The hotel has a great mall with many shops, food courts and restaurants, a starbuck, a nice bar and a pool. The rooms are large and clean and the bed was comfortable. The staff was very friendly and the stay was great. When we will come back to Orlando then we take this hotel - guaranteed.
reviews.title: Clean and comfortable. A real bargain except for the hidden $18 per day charge!

reviews.text: Hotel is situated in the middle of a great mall that includes the Apple store, the Microsoft store, plus Macy's, and Nordstrom. You get a large room so you can fill it up with purchases. Looking for cheap eats the mall has an unusually nice food court plus good restaurants scattered around if you do not feel like driving.
reviews.title: great time
Very nice
reviews.text: This hotel is wonderful. The rooms are spacious & clean. This is definetely a step up from your everyday hotel but is affordable.
I would recommend this hotel to anyone.
reviews.title: Florida Hotel Is Superb
Great Hotel!
reviews.text: This hotel has now been renamed. It is now called the Florida Hotel And Conference Center.
Have just stayed there for 10 nights and it is absolutely superb.
reviews.title: Great one night stay...planning on a full week return this year!

reviews.text: Rooms are beautifully furnished with LCD flat screen tv on the wall. Directly attached to the florida mall which has an excellent selection of shops and restaurants.
reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic Hotel!

reviews.text: Modern, crisp 'n clean, comfortable...the hotel is ideally situated, for the shop-a-holic, attached to one of Florida's biggest malls with all the major stores - - Macy's, Nordstrom, JC Penney, Sears - - and all the boutique stores in between. But I digress...back to the hotel. Beds have that wonderful cloud-pillow top on them that just lulls you to sleep like you're floating on a cloud! Maids don't start until noon and are super fast, efficient and almost invisible. No rude knocks on the door in the early morning hours!
reviews.title: 'Top Drawer' all the way

reviews.text: I was there for a seminar and all the food service was exceptional. Food came out on HOT plates, portions were amble and tasty. Service was quick and attentive, intuitively atuned to timely service.
reviews.title: GREAT TIME

reviews.text: One tiny glitch. No shower cap provided. Called and was told one would be sent up, but by second day, and third day, still no shower cap. (Hint: take the plastic bag out of the ice bucket and it can be used for a shower hat to keep at least some of your coiffeur dry in an emergency.)
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: Personally, I would have liked a liquid soap/glee to a bar soap in the tub, but I had brought my own so I was still happy...:):) I would return.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent the weekend at the Florida Hotel for a conference. Had a great time!! Room was spotless, bed was awesome, staff were wonderful, food was good. Happy Hour at Crickets was off the chain and they even had karaoke on Friday evening.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel in a great location

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for a business stay Jan 11-13. The location in the Florida Mall was very convenient. The room was clean and well appointed. The flat panel LCD TV on the wall was a nice touch. The room had a "door bell" where you could also indicate from inside the room whether you wanted the room clenaed or did not want to be disturbed. The chosen message displayed outside your room. My only complaint was that my mattress was very hard. After reading other reviews and talking to one of my co-workers (who had a pillow top mattress) it seems my mattress was just not replaced yet during their renovation. I would recommend this hotel to others.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel with hard beds

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is an excellent business hotel which offered us a very good rate during the holidays, i.e. when there are few business travellers. The only word of caution is about the concierges (or guest advisors) who went into "hard-sell" mode every time we asked them a question, mostly for visits to timeshare property sales events, but we were also irritated by the fact that all the "personally recommended" restaurants were owned by the same group. Also, the theme park tickets were not discounted as promised -- better buy them at the Orlando Visitor's Center.
reviews.title: Business Hotel Excellent for Tourists

likes.liked: — High standard of service and comfort.

reviews.text: Overall I would say the hotel is average. The beds are hard and the walls are thin, but I have stayed in worse. The bathroom was nice and so were the furnishings. But, I had to wear earplugs because it was so noisy. I could hear the "ding" of the elevator arriving on my floor from 10 rooms down. That is redicuous.
reviews.title: Nice location but the beds are hard and the walls are thin

reviews.text: My friend and I went down to Orlado with the red cross to be in place in case tropical strom ernesto gained strength. We got to stay at the Florida hotel and conference center. This place was no doubt the best hotel I ever stayed at. We stayed 3 nights and every morning that I woke up I was free of back and leg pain. (first time in over 4 years) The beds have down comforters and pads. My friend fell asleep almost instantly. (which is very rare for her). The staff are wonderful people very friendily and always asking if there is anything they could do for us. Our room was spotless , no mold or dirt. When I go on vacation to florida next year I will be staying here.
reviews.title: Best hotel I ever stayed at

likes.liked: — the beds were out of this world, flat screen tv on the wall, very clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Florida Mall Hotel is a very good hotel. And offers great value per 80 USD/night:
reviews.title: Good hotel- Great Service and value!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Florida Mall Hotel for a week in October. The hotel was lovely and looked very clean. We had a twin double room, which was spacious and clean. The staff always seemed friendly and nice. The bonus of this hotel for all you shoppers was that it was attached to the Mall, where you can shop till you drop!! There are also a number a restaurants within walking distance of the hotel (outside the complex). It was a great location and close to the I4 (which we used a LOT). We wouldn't hesitate to go back to this hotel it good for the young old and families.
reviews.title: Great Hotel!!!

likes.liked: — It was attached to a good shopping center

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: super hotel, ok no disney atmosphere but great location right into the mall. the bar in the evening had a good atmosphere due to alot of airline staff staying here, would go back to this hotel again especially if you want to be out of all the hussle and bussle of disney. we had no kids with us and it was a nice quite hotel for us with the choice of the hotel bar or orlando ale house across the car park and rugby tuesdays in the mall. rooms spotless and good size for two people maybe 3
reviews.title: super
Playing Hotel vs. Running One
reviews.text: Nothing to scream problematic, but way too many near misses to warrant satisfaction. Those that seem pleased probably don't travel much and most assuredly don't do so for business.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: * From the front desk that seems content to speak to one another rather than check in guests
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel!!

reviews.text: * To the desk attendants that immediately ask for your photo id and credit card, even if you have already supplied them with it (they get irritated if you point this out - okay this is a pet peeve of mine - it may not bntoher others)
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel

description: Located at The Florida Mall, the Florida Hotel and Conference Center offers amenities not available at most hotels including a Starbucks in our lobby and direct mall access. Located just minutes from the Orlando International Airport, the Orange County Convention Center, and Walt Disney World Resort, we are at the center of everything there is to do in Orlando.
